summary: Developing comprehensive Shopify Cash on Delivery app using Laravel + React SPA. Improved navigation speed by 90% and delivered large-scale features in 2-day cycles.
description: Developing comprehensive Shopify Cash on Delivery app using Laravel + React SPA architecture. Restructured application improving navigation speed by 90%. Delivered multi-layer features across complete Shopify ecosystem. Built high-performance microservices including native PHP short-link redirect service. Leveraged AI-powered development (Cursor + MCPs) for enhanced productivity. Delivered large-scale features (2,500+ lines per feature) with 2-day cycles.

summary: Delivered 10+ digital solutions, reduced delivery time by 95%, and designed infrastructure serving 10,000+ students. Cut server costs by 80% while improving performance.
description: Delivered 10+ end-to-end digital solutions accelerating organizational transformation. Reduced project delivery time by 95% (discussion to production in 2 days). Built Placement Test System serving multiple departments. Designed infrastructure serving 10,000+ students worldwide. Migrated server infrastructure reducing costs by 80% ($200→$40/month). Improved system performance by 35% while cutting costs. Created automated deployment pipeline with zero-touch deployments. Implemented automated backup system (8TB) with one-click restore.

summary: Developed backend and admin dashboard for white-label platform with reservations, loyalty programs, and e-commerce functionality.
description: Developed backend and admin dashboard for white-label platform. Integrated reservations, loyalty programs, and e-commerce functionality. Managed full project lifecycle from requirements to deployment. Collaborated with design teams ensuring product consistency.
